entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023
